oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter to Katherine Haught from Benjamin Haught
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter to wife Katherine from husband Benjamin Haught. He discusses his health and his hopes for a discharge. He was from Tyler County, Virginia/West Virginia. The letter is written from the U.S. General Hospital. Letter is a part of a large series, all of which was digitized by the Library of Virginia.
